body.p: Welcome to HPE Helion Public Cloud! We have a wide variety of services available with documentation to match. This page provides you a quick overview of our services and the information that we have available for you about those services.
This page covers the following topics:

li.xref: Starting to work with HPE Helion Public Cloud

section.title: Available Services
section.p: HPE Helion Public Cloud consists of many services based on the different OpenStack projects to provide the functionality you need. Visit the Available Services page for a complete list of services.

section.title: Starting to work with HPE Helion Public Cloud
section.p: Use the following links and tools to get to work with HPE Helion Public Cloud:

li.xref: Information, pricing, and setting up a free trial of HPE Helion Public Cloud

li.p: Getting Started with HPE Helion Public Cloud Console walks you through HPE Helion Public Cloud setup
We recommend that you visit this Getting Started page before you log on to the console.

section.title: REST API information
section.p: For detailed REST API information, view our HPE Helion Public Cloud APIs. In order to interact with the services, you'll need your Access Keys. In the upper-right hand corner of the console, click your account menuand select Manage Access Keys.

section.title: Language bindings
section.p: For creating your own applications, take a look at our Bindings information.
